attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I want to see all form's of viloent consel and computer games baned from sale in all high street shops and the internet.

I belive viloent console and computer games contribute to the carrying out acts of viloent crime by young people today.I consider violent computer games to be a directly influceing people to carry out acts of viloent crime.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
